quote: When done well, software is invisible
author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quote: The strength of JavaScript is that you can do anythingm, the weakness is that you will
author: Reg Braithwaite

quote: The most dangerous person is the one who listens, thinks and observes
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Theory and practice sometimes clash. And when that happens, theory loses. Every single time
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: C makes it easy to shoot yourself in the foot; C++ makes it harder, but when you do it blows your whole leg off
author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quote: People who think they know everything really annoy those of us who know we don't
author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quote: Student is not a container you have to fill but a torch you have to light up
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A ship in harbor is safe but that is not what ships are built for
author: John A. Shedd

quote: Skills can always be taught but passion and attitude are irreplaceable
author: unknown

quote: C is quirky, flawed, and an enormous success
author: Dennis Ritchie

quote: UNIX is basically a simple operating system, but you have to be a genius to understand the simplicity
author: Dennis Ritchie

quote: You have to be burning with an idea, or a problem, or a wrong that you want to right. If you're not passionate enough from the start, you'll never stick it out
author: Steve Jobs
